View on GitHub
Topmarks Fonts free, open, and easy to use type for children's learning

The basic structure of the Topmarks Fonts are derived from the Muli font design as can be seen from the overlays below.

Donate to Topmarks Fonts

If you wish to donate to the development of the Topmarks Fonts you can do so with paypal or flattr. To donate simply click below on the button of your choice.

Development status

current status
basic design
regular and bold weights
add cursive versions
add extra weights
final release
